title: AuraFlora Business Website with High-Class Pastel Abstract Theme

requirements.summary: Create a visually striking hero section with AuraFlora branding, tagline, and full-viewport abstract pastel background
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans the full viewport height
AuraFlora brand name is prominently displayed with elegant typography
Background blends at least 3 distinct pastel colours in an abstract gradient or artistic pattern
Section includes a short refined tagline and a call-to-action button

file_operations.description: Create hero section component with full-viewport height, elegant AuraFlora branding, refined tagline, and CTA button. Use the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as the background. Include the AuraFlora logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-logo.dim_400x120.png.
Import and render HeroSection component as the first section of the page

requirements.summary: Build an About section with asymmetric layout, pastel accents, and watercolour-style decorative elements
acceptanceCriteria: About section is visually distinct from the hero with a different pastel palette accent
Layout uses asymmetry or offset columns for an abstract, editorial feel
Decorative abstract shapes or colour blobs are present as design elements

file_operations.description: Create About section component with asymmetric layout describing AuraFlora as a premium brand. Include decorative abstract elements using the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-blob-accent.dim_800x800.png as an accent overlay or background element.
Import and render AboutSection component after the hero section

requirements.summary: Create a Services section showcasing 3–4 luxury service cards with distinct pastel backgrounds and elegant hover effects
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 service/offering cards are displayed
Each card uses a distinct pastel tint from the brand palette
Cards have smooth hover transitions (e.g., subtle scale, shadow, or colour shift)
Typography is elegant and consistent across all cards

file_operations.description: Create Services section component with 3–4 luxury service cards, each with unique pastel-tinted backgrounds (blush rose, lavender, sage, champagne) and refined hover effects
Create reusable ServiceCard component with props for title, description, icon, and pastel background colour. Include smooth hover transitions for scale, shadow, or colour shift
Import and render ServicesSection component after the About section

requirements.summary: Add a gallery section with grid/masonry layout displaying abstract pastel imagery
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery section displays at least 4–6 visual placeholders or generated images in a grid or masonry layout
Each image/placeholder uses the pastel brand colour palette
Section has a clean section heading and consistent spacing

file_operations.description: Create Gallery section component with grid or masonry layout displaying the generated images: frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-gallery-1.dim_600x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-gallery-2.dim_600x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-gallery-3.dim_600x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-gallery-4.dim_600x600.png. Include clean section heading and consistent spacing.
Import and render GallerySection component after the Services section

requirements.summary: Build a contact section with an elegant form (name, email, message) styled to match the pastel theme
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes name, email, and message fields
Form styling matches the overall pastel high-class aesthetic
Submit button uses a pastel accent colour with a refined hover effect
Section has appropriate heading and descriptive subtext

file_operations.description: Create Contact section component with minimal, elegant form including name, email, and message fields. Style form inputs and submit button to match the AuraFlora pastel theme with refined hover effects. Include section heading and descriptive subtext. Form submission should show a success message without backend integration.
Import and render ContactSection component after the Gallery section

requirements.summary: Design a sticky navigation bar with AuraFlora logo, smooth-scroll links, and frosted-glass effect
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar sticks to the top of the viewport on scroll
Includes AuraFlora wordmark or logo on the left
Navigation links scroll smoothly to corresponding sections
Navbar uses frosted-glass or soft semi-transparent pastel background

file_operations.description: Create sticky navigation bar component with AuraFlora logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/auraflora-logo.dim_400x120.png on the left and smooth-scroll links to all sections (Hero, About, Services, Gallery, Contact). Apply frosted-glass or soft semi-transparent pastel background effect.
Import and render Navbar component at the top of the page layout, before all sections

requirements.summary: Add a footer with AuraFlora branding, social links, and copyright text in contrasting pastel tone
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains brand name, descriptor, and copyright notice
Includes placeholder social links styled consistently
Footer colour contrasts tastefully with the rest of the page while remaining within the pastel palette

file_operations.description: Create footer component with AuraFlora brand name, brief descriptor, placeholder social media links, and copyright text. Use a contrasting pastel tone (deeper or more saturated within the palette) to complete the page design.
Import and render Footer component at the bottom of the page, after all sections

requirements.summary: Apply cohesive global design system with curated pastel palette, elegant typography, and abstract decorative elements
acceptanceCriteria: All sections share a consistent pastel colour palette of at least 4 tones
Headings use an elegant serif or display typeface throughout
Decorative abstract elements (blobs, gradients, overlays) appear in at least 3 sections
Whitespace usage gives the site a premium, uncluttered feel
Design feels cohesive from top to bottom

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind configuration with custom AuraFlora pastel colour palette (blush rose, lavender mist, sage green, champagne gold). Add elegant serif/display font family for headings and clean sans-serif for body text. Configure spacing scale for generous whitespace.

Add global styles for the AuraFlora design system: import custom fonts (serif for headings, sans-serif for body), define CSS custom properties for the pastel palette, add base styles for smooth scrolling, and apply generous whitespace utilities. Include styles for abstract decorative elements (floating blobs, soft gradients, translucent overlays).
